titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the House of Peeres novv assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of the young-men, apprentices, and sea-men, in and about the citie of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Oulton & G. Dexter, and are to be sold by William Larnar,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Eton College. Library.
